entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
